query.description: The query to use to filter logs

pod.description: The name of the pod to search logs for.  This needs to be an EXACT name, you should *ALWAYS* discover the current pods first before using this filter

before.description: An ISO8601 timestamp to search for logs either before or after

after.description: An ISO8601 timestamp to search for logs either before or after

limit.description: The number of logs lines to return
